name: Hentai Sweet Battle
description:
This is a game that combines cards and visual novel elements.
If you want to learn more about those girls, you need to fight them first.
If you want to win the battle, choose the best card to fight. And of course, Restoring energy is necessary.
You will meet beautiful women in the game world: the elegant forest Elf, the charming female devil,the cute cat girl, the noble female knight, smart female mage and so on. You will struggle to fight with them use cards. After you have passed through, you will be able to “make friends” those sweet girls...。。。

Game feature：
This is a game that combines cards and visual novel elements.
There are 4 different cards in game,each card has its own skill, use them in a right way.
There are 12 female characters, all characters are animated.
There are 12 “SWEET” mode.
